version_description:
Test your reflexes and battle through this Team Action RPG!
Scheduled for launch Sept. 28, 2021.
Stay up to date via our official website and social media channels!

Update Details
• Bug fixes and improvements implemented.

Update Details
• Bug fixes and improvements implemented.

■Update Details
・Introduced Rank Battle
・Added the Accolades feature
・Various other minor bug fixes have also been implemented.
*Please see in-game announcements for details.

■Update Details
・New Vocation Added: Martial Artist.
・New Function Added: Party Reset. Use this option to remove all equipment from your current party.
・Equipment details will now include info on whether a piece of equipment is currently equipped and by whom.
・Made various other minor bug fixes.
*Please see in-game announcements for details.

■Update Details
・Preparations for a new event have been implemented.
・The inventory limit for Soul Crystals has been changed to 300.
・New Function Added: Save Soul Skill.
・Made various other minor bug fixes.
*Please see in-game announcements for details.
